summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2694, for the improvement of Boren Avenue and Boren Avenue North, from Virginia Street to John Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt, under Ordinance No. 31643 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
